pagination_frame.label: Pagination Frame
pagination_frame.comment: How many links to display at once.

pagination_frame_skip.label: Pagination Frame Skip
pagination_frame_skip.comment: If the current frame position does not cover utmost pages, will render link to current position plus/minus this value.

anchor_text_for_previous.label: Anchor Text for Previous
anchor_text_for_previous.comment: Alternative text for previous link in pagination menu. If empty, default arrow image will used.

anchor_text_for_next.label: Anchor Text for Next
anchor_text_for_next.comment: Alternative text for next link in pagination menu. If empty, default arrow image will used.

logo.label: Logo Image
logo.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png. To make logo look good on high-resolution displays, upload an image that is 2x normal size and then specify 1x dimensions in width/height fields below.

logo_width.label: Logo Width
logo_width.comment: Only necessary if image has been uploaded above. Enter number of pixels, without appending "px".

logo_height.label: Logo Height
logo_height.comment: Only necessary if image has been uploaded above. Enter number of pixels, without appending "px".

css_non_inline.label: Non-inline CSS File(s)
css_non_inline.comment: Comma-delimited list of files that will be included inside <style> tag for all templates that include use the '{{var non_inline_styles}}' variable. File path is relative to skin/frontend/PACKAGE/THEME/css/

allow_ips.label: Allowed IPs (comma separated)
allow_ips.comment: Leave empty for access from any location.

allow_symlink.label: Allow Symlinks
allow_symlink.comment: Warning! Enabling this feature is not recommended on production environments because it represents a potential security risk.

active_admin.label: Enabled for Admin
active_admin.comment: Translate, blocks and other output caches should be disabled for both frontend and admin inline translations.

file.label: System Log File Name

password_reset_link_expiration_period.label: Recovery Link Expiration Period (hours)
